pr_title: Make Warrants eligible for I18N translation.

timeline.message:
Make Warrants eligible for I18N translation.
Make some cells in the Throttle Command table drop down comboBexes.
Execute non-speed setting commands during warrant ramping.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/JMRI/JMRI into MessAround
Fix static analysis problem and remove comment out code
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/JMRI/JMRI into pcWarrantI18N

timeline.bodyText: Spotbugs complains about this line. The parameter command is known to be null at this point. So the @SuppressFBWarnings needs to be removed.
timeline.author: danielb987
